settings.name: VIRTUAL_CURSOR
instructions: Press Alt+Delete to determine which cursor is active.
If the PC cursor is active, press Escape to activate the virtual cursor.

settings.name: PC_CURSOR
instructions: Press Alt+Delete to determine which cursor is active.
If the virtual cursor is active, press Insert+z to disable the virtual cursor.

settings.name: BROWSE_MODE
instructions: If NVDA made the focus mode sound , press Insert+Space again to turn browse mode back on.

settings.name: FOCUS_MODE
instructions: If NVDA made the browse mode sound , press Insert+Space again to turn focus mode back on.

settings.name: QUICK_NAV_ON
instructions: Simultaneously press left and right arrow keys.
If VoiceOver said 'quick nav off', press the left and right arrow keys again to turn it back on.

settings.name: QUICK_NAV_OFF
instructions: Simultaneously press left and right arrow keys.
If VoiceOver said 'quick nav on', press the left and right arrow keys again to turn it back off.
